  • Method Details

    • getCurrentPage

      Object getCurrentPage()
      Returns:
      Returns the Gosu object that represents the current page

    • getCurrentWorksheet

      Object getCurrentWorksheet()
      Returns:
      Returns the Gosu object that represents the current worksheet; or null, if there's no worksheet

    • dismissAndGetConfirmation

      String dismissAndGetConfirmation()
      Dismisses the confirmation dialog
      Returns:
      the confirmation message

    • isConfirmationShowing

      boolean isConfirmationShowing()
      Returns whether a confirmation message is showing
      Returns:
      true if confirmation message waiting, else false

    • dismissAndGetAlert

      String dismissAndGetAlert()
      Dismisses the alert dialog
      Returns:
      the alert message

    • refreshPage

      Object refreshPage()
      Posts the page to server
      Returns:
      The current page after the refresh is done

    • goToEntryPoint

      Object goToEntryPoint(String entryPoint)
      Used instead of login: takes the user directly to the specified page.
      Parameters:
      entryPoint - , e.g. 'Dictionary'
      Returns:
      The current page after the refresh is done

    • goToEntryPoint

      Object goToEntryPoint(String entryPoint, Map<String,String> parameters)
      Used instead of login: takes the user directly to the specified page. This version takes the parameter list.
      Returns:
      The current page after the refresh is done
